snippet: Hasbro reported its biggest rise in quarterly revenue in nearly five years, handily beating analysts’ estimates.
abstract: Hasbro reports largest quarterly revenue gain in half decade, exceeding analyst expectations.
lead_paragraph: Hasbro reported its biggest rise in quarterly revenue in nearly five years, handily beating analysts’ estimates.

headline.main: Hasbro Revenues Propelled by Two Top-Grossing Movies
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Hasbro Revenues Propelled by Two Top-Grossing Movies
